channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox in 'Pups Save a Jukebox', then in 'Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire', a hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go wrong. (S9, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: We get wet in 'Pups Stop a Big Leak', there's fun in 'Pups Save a Baby Anteater', Ace helps in 'Pups Save a Hatch Day', and Mr Porter's truck gets stuck in 'Pups Save the Munchie Mobile'. (S8, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Calling Kylie; House Rules: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Igloo: It's a snowy day and Peppa's family build an igloo for their snowman. They then hide away in it during the snowstorm, but Penny Polar Bear and her parents love snowstorms and Peppa's igloo too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Bull is Getting Married: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when everyone finds out that Mr Bull and Mrs Cow are going to get married the next day! (S7, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic makes everything wacky in 'Wonky Wishing Wand', then in 'Bip Bip's Big Show', Dora gets Bip Bip to his concert with Tico. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Scaredy discovers the forest in 'The Tour', and then in 'Smurfing a Masterpiece', Baby Smurf is the new Painter! (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Mermaid Cruise Ship: All aboard the S.S. MerCat! It's time to go on a mermaid-tastic cruise with Gabby and Pandy, as they cruise to Mermaid Cove, where they see a special show! (S3, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Space Mission Blaze: When three of Blaze's friends get launched into outer space on out-of-control jetpacks, Astronauts Blaze and AJ must blast off to save them! (S8, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Zuma and Hurricane get swept off the beach in 'Pups Save the Mountain Surfers', then in 'Pups Save Humdinger's Home Away From Home', Mayor Humdinger takes his kitties for a holiday. (S11, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A sudden avalanche hits in 'Pups Get Your Goat', then in 'Pups Save the Crop Circles', Farmer Al finds mysterious crop circles in his corn field, and calls on the Paw Patrol to help. (S11, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Perfect Day: While Mummy Pig is enjoying a spa day out, Daddy, George and Peppa explore the rest of the shopping centre. (S5, ep 28).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Charity Shop: Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, Peppa and George decide to take all the things they don't use anymore to the charity shop, which raises money to help others.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bat and Ball; Please and Thank You: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Potty Training; Lots of Muddy Puddles: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hoops; Detective Potato: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Games: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dinner Party: Snooty King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to King and Queen Thistle's castle to sample Nanny Plum's cooking. Nanny tries hard to cook special modern food.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Uncle Gaston: Three baby ladybirds, Amber, Emerald and Keith have come to stay at Uncle Gaston's for the day. The baby ladybirds are exhausting! So Ben and Holly help Gaston to keep them entertained.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle Is Not Well: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's Birthday: King Thistle does not want to get any older so decides that no one must celebrate his birthday. But all of the Little Kingdom has been waiting to celebrate.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs. Witch's Spring Clean: Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum help Mrs Witch have a bit of a clear-out. The children bring the magical items back home, but in the wrong hands they cause a few problems.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A mixed-up delivery leads to chaos in 'Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater', then in 'Pups Save Ryder's Surprise', Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped. (S7, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A dance contest goes wrong in 'Dancing with Luke Stars!', then in 'Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus', the pups investigate a mystery at an undersea museum exhibit, and discover an octopus! (S8, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Mermaid Cruise Ship: All aboard the S.S. MerCat! It's time to go on a mermaid-tastic cruise with Gabby and Pandy, as they cruise to Mermaid Cove, where they see a special show! (S3, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: New Shoes; Windy Castle: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Funfair; Pottery: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Teddy's Day Out; Nursery Rhymes: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Museum: The family visit a museum. Peppa likes the room with things from Kings and Queens of long ago. George loves the dinosaur room.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Pet Competition: There is a pet competition at playgroup, and everyone has brought in their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but finds it hard to choose the best pet.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Stinkwell skunks help the duo find 'The Disappearing Dung Ball', then in 'The Search for the Spotted Frog', Nature ranger Wally Bunker joins Sam and Kit to look for a pet frog. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Hefty decides to take Timid under his wing in 'Curing Private Timid', and then in 'Smurfette Overdoes It!', Smurfette wears herself out, so Lazy teaches her the art of doing nothing. (S2, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic makes everything wacky in 'Wonky Wishing Wand', then in 'Bip Bip's Big Show', Dora gets Bip Bip to his concert with Tico. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Goodway's gesture of goodwill gift grows out of control in 'Pups Save a Giant Plant', then in 'Pups Get Stuck', Metal mayhem ensues when Marshall's Fire Truck becomes mysteriously magnetized.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Everest, the Turbots and a space rock get trapped in a cave in 'Pups Save a Space Rock', then in 'Pups Save a Good Mayor', Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups build the first hotel in town in 'The Crew Builds A Hotel', and then in 'The Crew Builds A Hiking Trail', the crew saves a duck birthday party. (S2, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Pillow Pirate: When a burgling buccaneer steals every pillow, it's up to Special Mission Blaze to save bedtime! Using the power of addition, can Blaze solve this pillow problem? (S7, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kitty Fairy Gets Sick: When Kitty Fairy gets sick, Gabby, Pandy and the others get her to the garden. (S1, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Big Bad Barry: King Thistle wants fish for dinner, so he goes out fishing with Mr Elf, Ben and Holly on Mr Elf's boat. Mr Elf tells them a story about the biggest, baddest fish ever - Big Bad Barry.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Superheroes: The children are playing a game of superheroes. When Strawberry takes her supervillain role a bit too far, it is up to Elf Man and Fairy Girl to save the day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Stinkwell skunks help the duo find 'The Disappearing Dung Ball', then in 'The Search for the Spotted Frog', Nature ranger Wally Bunker joins Sam and Kit to look for a pet frog. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic makes everything wacky in 'Wonky Wishing Wand', then in 'Bip Bip's Big Show', Dora gets Bip Bip to his concert with Tico. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Rocky goes missing at Uncle Otis's cabin in 'Pups and the Werepuppy!', then in 'Pups Save a Sleepwalking Mayor', It's Cowboy Day, and Mayor Goodway faces the hazards of the ranch while sleepwalking.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles! (S7, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Racquet Games: Miss Rabbit gives Peppa and friends a tennis lesson, but the tennis balls get everywhere! So, the children play badminton instead and it's a lot easier. (S7, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roof Top Garden; Moving In: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everybody Sleepover!; Walking Bus: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny's Magic Test: Nanny's magic licence is out of date and in order to get a new one she must pass a test, set by the Wise Old Elf.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Chickens Ride West: King Thistle wants a boiled egg for his breakfast, so the elves decide to deliver the King the chickens from the Elf Farm so he can have an egg whenever he likes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Mermaid: Lucy and her dad are having a relaxing day boating on the lake. They fish out an old glittery mirror from the bottom of the lake, but it belongs to a mermaid who would like it back.
